name: RuinsCity_VR
developer: Beijing Touch the heart interactive technology co., LTD
publisher: Beijing Touch the heart interactive technology co., LTD
description: RuinsCityVR Game is one and a half of sand box of VRgame, a city by virus attacks, many people unfortunately infected by the virus to the original consciousness become a walking dead, they are only for the sake of food!!!!! But you are the only one to survive in this city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX980 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX980 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
